name: Monthly Report of Raw material, packaging & components
query:
select
sl.warehouse as "DIVISION::200",
sl.item_code as "ERP CODE:Link/Item:200",
i.item_name as "ITEM NAME::300",
i.stock_uom as "UNIT::100",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and CASE WHEN %(month)s > 1 then (month(sli.posting_date) < %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s) ELSE (year(sli.posting_date)< %(year)s) END order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "OPENING STOCK::200",
IFNULL((select ABS(ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty))) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 1 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1   order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 1::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 2 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1   order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 2::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 3 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 3::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 4 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 4::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 5 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 5::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 6 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 6::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 7 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 7::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 8 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 8::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 9 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 9::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 10 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 10::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 11 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 11::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 12 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 12::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 13 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 13::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 14 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 14::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 15 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 15::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 16 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 16::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 17 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 17::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 18 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 18::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 19 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 19::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 20 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 20::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 21 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 21::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 22 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 22::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 23 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 23::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 24 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 24::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 25 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 25::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 26 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 26::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 27 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 27::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 28 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 28::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 29 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 29::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 30 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 30::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 31 and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse ,sli.creation desc ),0) as " 31::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0) as "ISSUED THIS MONTH::200",
IFNULL((select sum(sli.actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty>=0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0) as "PURCHASED THIS MONTH::200",
((IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and CASE WHEN %(month)s > 1 then (month(sli.posting_date) < %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s) ELSE (year(sli.posting_date)< %(year)s) END order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0))-(IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0))+(IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty >= 0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0))) as "CLOSING STOCK::200",
IFNULL((select sli.valuation_rate from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "value per Pcs/Kg::100",
(IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date) = %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s and sli.actual_qty<0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0))*(IFNULL((select sli.valuation_rate from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< %(month)s and year(sli.posting_date)= %(year)s order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)) as "Month Consumption in birr::100"
from `tabItem` i join `tabStock Ledger Entry` sl
where sl.item_code=i.item_code and sl.item_code LIKE "RM%%" and sl.company=%(company)s
group by sl.warehouse,sl.item_code,i.item_name
order by sl.item_code,sl.creation desc,sl.warehouse desc,sl.posting_date desc, sl.posting_time desc;
report_name: Monthly Report of Raw material, packaging & components
